short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stops Certain Pages to stop loading after the main content has.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A plugin that stops the page loading after the main content has loaded, getting around paywalls that shouldn't be there and any unethical scripts.

Currently works on:

- https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/*/*
- https://www.afr.com/*/*
- https://www.smh.com.au/*/* (Might need to refresh)
- https://www.nytimes.com/*/*",
- https://www.economist.com/*/*"
- https://www.businessinsider.com/*
